name: EntLibHibernate
short_description: EntHibernate is an O/R Mapper that follows the MS Enterprise Library 2.0 Application Blocks Guidelines. EntHibernate palnned features are based on the Hibernate/NHibernate Frameworks, both supported by JBoss.
